sentence.Network_en: Hundreds of lives were lost in fighting.

sentence.Network_en: The committee member had difficulty in fighting his suggestion through.

sentence.Network_en: We must unite the workers in fighting against inhuman conditions.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们必须使工人们团结起来反对那些难以忍受的工作条件.
